name: Idle Diorama 3D
description:
Have you ever dreamed of creating your very own Diorama?
Yeah! it's time to make it happen. You have an opportunity to make your awesome Dioramas
in this game from Scratch.
But Wait!!! it's not the final part. Your Diorama will be going live after finishing its every part.
AMAZING! isn't it?
This is the fisrt experince making Dioramas in the idle games.
Special Features:

- Discover the New Dioramas
- Fantastic Artstyle with nice animations
- Find out how the Dioramas be created and enjoy
- Creating Dioramas in your Mobilephone without messing around
- See How's the Dioramas look like if they're being alive in the real world

So, Don't waste the time and start Creating your own Diorama ;)
